about_the_game:
Have you ever wanted to try what it's like to be a programmer, graphic designer, or tester, but you didn't have the right skills or time to learn them? In DevLIfe you can experience it for yourself! Create your character and guide him or her through life in the IT industry. Complete commissions, create your projects, set up your own company, hire employees, and lead them to success!



Although the game is in Early Access, it already contains many features and a mechanic. The most important of them are:

  • Creating your own character, choosing traits, and building your career in the IT industry
  • Make thought choices in Interactive Events that shape both the gameplay and the story of your character!
  • Four extensive skill trees - learn how to create websites, mobile applications, video games, and desktop applications. Decide what direction you want to take in your career!
  • Finding and fulfilling commissions for external clients and improving your skills through learning
  • Starting your own company, creating your own projects, hiring employees, and taking care of their well-being and growth
  • Four unique locations: family house, bay office, desert office and city center office
  • Build Mode - buy new furniture, decorations, or RTV equipment and take care of the comfort and high performance of your employees



We won't stop here. In future versions, we plan to expand the "life" aspect of DevLife by adding more theme-based Interactive Events. Besides, with each update in the game the available content will be expanded, there are plans for:

  • New Character Customization Options
  • Additional Locations
  • New Furniture

We will listen to players' opinions and introduce their ideas into the game to make it as much playable as we can. We hope that your experience with DevLife will be the most enjoyable!

content_descriptors.notes: Mentions of assisted suicide and euthanasia.

detailed_description:
Join our Community!


About the Game



Have you ever wanted to try what it's like to be a programmer, graphic designer, or tester, but you didn't have the right skills or time to learn them? In DevLIfe you can experience it for yourself! Create your character and guide him or her through life in the IT industry. Complete commissions, create your projects, set up your own company, hire employees, and lead them to success!



Although the game is in Early Access, it already contains many features and a mechanic. The most important of them are:

  • Creating your own character, choosing traits, and building your career in the IT industry
  • Make thought choices in Interactive Events that shape both the gameplay and the story of your character!
  • Four extensive skill trees - learn how to create websites, mobile applications, video games, and desktop applications. Decide what direction you want to take in your career!
  • Finding and fulfilling commissions for external clients and improving your skills through learning
  • Starting your own company, creating your own projects, hiring employees, and taking care of their well-being and growth
  • Four unique locations: family house, bay office, desert office and city center office
  • Build Mode - buy new furniture, decorations, or RTV equipment and take care of the comfort and high performance of your employees



We won't stop here. In future versions, we plan to expand the "life" aspect of DevLife by adding more theme-based Interactive Events. Besides, with each update in the game the available content will be expanded, there are plans for:

  • New Character Customization Options
  • Additional Locations
  • New Furniture

We will listen to players' opinions and introduce their ideas into the game to make it as much playable as we can. We hope that your experience with DevLife will be the most enjoyable!

name: DevLife

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD Athlon II X4 645
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 440 / AMD Radeon 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 or i7-4720HQ / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750Ti or GTX 960M / AMD R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: In DevLife you start your career just before hitting 18. It's up to you to choose who you want to be - a graphic designer or maybe a programmer? Will it be a Website design or Mobile Applications? It is up to you to decide! And what if you chose wrong? Well... You will have to live with that!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish*, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
